img_above_text:
![Wukong Karma 19.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/f7/Wukong_Karma_19.jpg)
With the Yaoguai Chief defeated, be sure to check around behind the large stone monument near where you fought the miniboss. On a small snow-covered table, you can find the **Jade Essence** \- a new Gourd Drink that allows you to recover mana as well as health!
img_below_text:
From the boss area, you can find another path leading back up past a small wooden arch to the upper field of this region. There's a few wandering enemies to put down around here, including a Crow Diviner standing in a field looking over a Ginsengling hiding in the ground, and a green Wisp to absorb nearby.
![Wukong Karma 20.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/5/56/Wukong_Karma_20.jpg)
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Karma 19.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/f7/Wukong_Karma_19.jpg)
With the Yaoguai Chief defeated, be sure to check around behind the large stone monument near where you fought the miniboss. On a small snow-covered table, you can find the **Jade Essence** \- a new Gourd Drink that allows you to recover mana as well as health!"
        - Following Text: "From the boss area, you can find another path leading back up past a small wooden arch to the upper field of this region. There's a few wandering enemies to put down around here, including a Crow Diviner standing in a field looking over a Ginsengling hiding in the ground, and a green Wisp to absorb nearby.
![Wukong Karma 20.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/5/56/Wukong_Karma_20.jpg)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a combat scene in a snowy environment from *Black Myth: Wukong*. The player character, Wukong, is engaged in battle with an enemy, emitting fiery effects during the attack. The HUD displays abilities, health, mana, and collected resources like "Will." This area follows the defeat of the Yaoguai Chief and exploration near a stone monument, where players can find the **Jade Essence**. The scene transitions toward a path leading to an upper field with additional enemies, including a Crow Diviner and collectibles like a green Wisp.
